review: Talk about a small device that can turn your TV into a Smart TV. This is a true worth having plug and play device for anyone whom has netflix, Amazon Prime, HBO and would like to bring the world of YouTube to your living room or other bedroom tv. This device is a hub and if you already subscribe to the many movie streaming services, they all come to life on any TV with an HDMI port thru your Internet WiFi connection. it's as simple as that.
